data.content:
noun
plural -olds
[count] old-fashioned :a man whose wife has sex with someone else :a man's whose wife commits adultery
verb
-olds; -olded; -olding
[+ obj] old-fashioned
to have sex with someone other than (your husband)
There were rumors that his wife had cuckolded him.
to have sex with the wife of (another man)
He was cuckolded by his best friend.
